channel.title: LAUNCH PROBLEM PLZ HELP ME
channel.description:
im begging u for help, i bought the game in steam and cant launch it my pc is ok, win 7
here the text of error, yes its russiand so what RUSSIANS NEED HELP TOO. i figured out that ITS ( error calld BEX) comes from "DEP" thing in PC comfiguration. But i cant turn it off couse it SAYS WHAT ITS CANT BE TURNED OF FOR THAT .EXE FILE
Имя события проблемы: BEX Имя приложения: bms.exe Версия приложения: 0.0.0.0 Отметка времени приложения: 56735edf Имя модуля с ошибкой: StackHash_0a9e Версия модуля с ошибкой: 0.0.0.0 Отметка времени модуля с ошибкой: 00000000 Смещение исключения: 00000000 Код исключения: c0000005 Данные исключения: 00000008 Версия ОС: 6.1.7601.2.1.0.768.3 Код языка: 1049 Дополнительные сведения 1: 0a9e Дополнительные сведения 2: 0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789 Дополнительные сведения 3: 0a9e Дополнительные сведения 4: 0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789
so here we go - i tried to verefy intergity of game cache -reinstulled the game -restarted pc -tried "DEP" thing
PLZ HELP ME

item.title: LAUNCH PROBLEM PLZ HELP ME
item.dc:creator: Flavrans
item.description:
BEX indicates a buffer overflow or DEP exception.

It’s possible that some other software on your computer is interfering with bms.exe, causing it to crash. It can be AntiVirus/Firewall/Security software, game recording software, programs that change Windows font rendering or UI, desktop sharing software, OSD software (for example software that displays gpu stats while playing a game), or malware.

If you are running some AntiVirus/Firewall software, try disabling it temporarily and see if the problem persists. Or, see if you have any other software installed that might interfere with bms.exe and try disabling or uninstalling it.

It can also be a problem with the graphics or audio drivers. See if you can update them to a newer version (if you are not already using the latest drivers for your hardware).

I hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: LAUNCH PROBLEM PLZ HELP ME
item.dc:creator: vovikikmad
item.description:
CPU:

Once there on the advanced tab under performance, click settings then go to the data execution prevention tab and add the game or program to the exception list.

thanks you, but as i said i tried that “DEP” thing ( DATA EXECUTION PREVENTION) and like i said it didnot work becouse of “U CANT ADD THAT EXE FILE. IT MUST WORK ON DEP”
thanx for you help, ill try it :C

Read full topic

item.title: LAUNCH PROBLEM PLZ HELP ME
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Apparently, this is a Windows issue.

Right click your computer icon go to properties and advanced system settings and then under the advanced tab go to system properties. Once there on the advanced tab under performance, click settings then go to the data execution prevention tab and add the game or program to the exception list.

You also might want to check out these posts and see if they help you:

https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2593098

https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_other-windows_programs/problem-event-name-bex-error-message/cf5baf73-0877-4070-abfb-a2c3a17a9e10?auth=1

Read full topic
